argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | isumcl.1 | |- Z = ( ZZ>= ` M ) |
| 2 |  | isumcl.2 | |- ( ph -> M e. ZZ ) |
| 3 |  | isumcl.3 | |- ( ( ph /\ k e. Z ) -> ( F ` k ) = A ) |
| 4 |  | isumcl.4 | |- ( ( ph /\ k e. Z ) -> A e. CC ) |
| 5 |  | isumcl.5 | |- ( ph -> seq M ( + , F ) e. dom ~~> ) |
| 6 | 1, 2, 3, 4 | #P_isum | |- ( ph -> sum_ k e. Z A = ( ~~> ` seq M ( + , F ) ) ) |
| 7 |  | #P_fclim | |- ~~> : dom ~~> --> CC |
| 8 |  | #P_ffvelrn | |- ( ( ~~> : dom ~~> --> CC /\ seq M ( + , F ) e. dom ~~> ) -> ( ~~> ` seq M ( + , F ) ) e. CC ) |
| 9 | 7, 5, 8 | #P_sylancr | |- ( ph -> ( ~~> ` seq M ( + , F ) ) e. CC ) |
| 10 | 6, 9 | #P_eqeltrd | |- ( ph -> sum_ k e. Z A e. CC ) |
